course_description: A tutorial designed primarily to assist honors candidates in preparing their projects. Students will be approved for Honors in Playwriting 494RW when the principal focus of the project is writing a new script.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5575, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: K. Belflower, Status: Closed
